# mediaTimeScale

**Instance Property**

The time scale of the track in the output file.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaTimeScale: CMTimeScale { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `0`, which indicates that the input chooses an appropriate value, if applicable. It’s an error to set this value if the input’s media type is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaType/audio].

You can’t set this value after writing starts.

## Configuring presentation

- **naturalSize**: The natural display dimensions of the output’s visual media.
- **transform**: The transform to use for display of the output’s visual media.
- **preferredVolume**: The volume to prefer for playback of the output’s audio data.
- **marksOutputTrackAsEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to enable a track in the output for playback and processing.
